item.description:
Chinese New Year Celebration

Event Date: February 01, 2012 - 5:00pm

Event Type: Open to public | Location: Campus Center Ballroom

It is the Year of the Dragon and the UMass Boston community is in for a rare treat. Just in time to celebrate Chinese New Year, the Zhejiang University Wenqin Arts Troupe will perform at UMass Boston on Wednesday afternoon, February 1.

The performance and refreshments are free to the public. The Confucius Institute on campus is hosting this event. This Arts Troupe consists of six teams, including a symphony orchestra, a vocal team, a dance team, a drama team, a Chinese traditional music team and a keyboard orchestra.

The performers will only visit two other universities in New England during this tour of the United States. It is a great opportunity to experience Chinese culture and sample some authentic Chinese food.  

For more information, please contact Confucius Institute Associate Director Baifeng Sun at Baifeng.Sun@umb.edu or 617-287-7291.
